overview:
Anubhav is passionate about e-commerce, internet technologies and everything that touches customer experience.

He figured the potential of e-commerce & mobility while developing a number of next-generation e-commerce products for world’s largest airlines like United, Delta, Qantas, et al.

Having done long stints with several technology giants, he brings strong understanding of how technology can make things simpler, thus better.

He works untiringly at creating wow! moments every time someone uses our offerings. For him, the best investment in marketing a product or service is - by creating happy customers.
